lines.text: I hear thee. So as I hear, be thee assured my response is forthcoming!
It's when you mix the particular place, not here, but on the outside, well, that's when the power hits ya!
It's sort... it's built in, it's like telepathy.

[incredulously]
Did you ever hear of a tornado at sea?
Well, that's what Doc called it. Sounded like his balloon's being torn apart! Whatever the number, it got him real good and surrounded.
The water, man! The ocean! Anyway you shake it, those poor devils either ended up on it, in it or under it!
The brain! It's going to be destroyed!
The power will start again! The backup brain was hidden years ago, just in case!
